name: Sparkwave
summary:
Sparkwave is a gorgeous hex styled twitch game. It is fast paced and intense!
The objective of the Sparkwave is to go the greatest distance while avoiding obstacles, always staying on the 'track'. The player can only survive being off-track for a limited time.
Crystals can be collected in order to unlock new 'sparks' and purchase items, which can simplify or enhance gameplay.
